titles.title: 10 by 10 Act
A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require all gasoline sold for use in motor vehicles to contain 10 percent renewable fuel in the year 2010 and thereafter, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5934)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

reference.label: text of measure as introduced in Senate

bill.summary:
5/10/2007--Introduced.
10 by 10 Act - Amends the Clean Air Act to make it unlawful after December 31, 2009, for any person to sell, supply, offer for sale or supply, dispense, transport, or introduce into commerce, for use in any motor vehicle, any gasoline with less than 10% renewable fuel by volume.
